snippet: As a Russian loan runs out and Cyprus seeks aid, Germany finds itself in a fierce debate over whether to help bail out the island nation.
abstract: Germany has found itself in fierce debate over whether to help bail out Cyprus, now that Russian loan to Cyprus is running out.

byline.contributor: Nicholas Kulish contributed reporting from Berlin, and Jack Ewing from Frankfurt.

lead_paragraph: As a Russian loan runs out and Cyprus seeks aid, Germany finds itself in a fierce debate over whether to help bail out the island nation.

headline.seo: Cyprus Complicates German Quest to Save Euro Zone
headline.main: Question of Aiding Cyprus Places Germany in a Bind
headline.print_headline: Question of Aiding Cyprus Places Germany in a Bind

keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
keywords.name: organizations
